body.name: Baby Einstein Ocean Explorers Kick to It Opus Musical Infant to Toddler Rocker, Ages 0-30 Months
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 19 hrs 29 mins
features: The Baby Einstein Ocean Explorers Kick to It Opus Infant to Toddler Rocker is a unisex, infant rocker and stationary seat that transforms into a toddler rocker as baby grows.
2 settings: In Baby-Activated, babys kicks are rewarded with lights and 25+ melodies and sounds. Parent-Activated plays 30+ minutes of music with dancing lights.
Features a removable toy bar with lights, music, 2 dangling toys, and vibration setting to help entertain infants.
Detach the toy bar to transform the infant rocker into a comfy, stationary seat for older babies, or to convert into a toddler rocker. Maximum weight for use: 40 pounds.
Requires two AA batteries (not included). Soft seat pad features an ocean theme fabric and is removable for easy cleaning. Assembled dimensions: 27.3 x 19.7 x 23.3 inches.
body.description: The Baby Einstein Ocean Explorers Kick to It Opus Musical Infant to Toddler Rocker transforms from an infant rocker seat to a stationary chair and toddler rocker to give baby an engaging, comfy spot to relax and explore. Baby-Activated Setting rewards babys kicks with dancing lights, 25+ melodies and sounds. Parent-Activated Setting engages baby with 30+ minutes of playful music and gentle lights. Baby will love to bat and reach for the 2 dangling toys or enjoy relaxing vibrations. As baby grows, the infant rocker transforms into a cozy, stationary seat and again into a toddler rocker. Removeable seat pad is easy to clean. Maximum weight for use is 40 pounds. Not intended for infant sleep. Dimensions: 27.3 (H) x 19.7 (W) x 23.3 (D) inches. Requires 2 AA batteries (not included).

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎Seat pad: Remove from frame. Wipe clean with a damp cloth and mild soap. Toy bar & toys: Wipe clean with a damp cloth and mild soap. Do not immerse in water. Frame: Wipe with a soft, clean cloth and mild soap. General: Store in a dry location away from any sources of heat or sunlight.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Introducing Baby Einstein Ocean Explorers Dive into an ocean of curious discoveries! Now streaming on YouTube, join beloved Baby Einstein characters to learn about the ocean through STEAM-based principles and real footage of the deep. Co-view, sing, and dance-along to catchy and educational songs that spark baby's curiosity. Keep exploring!

Things to Know Versatile, 2-in-1 stationary seat & toddler rocker 5-point harness keeps baby comfy & secure Delights and engages baby with lights, vibrations, & music Removeable seat pad is easy to clean Baby Einstein Ocean Explorers Kick to It Opus Musical Infant to Toddler Rocker Baby’s new favorite seat to relax, rock, & explore! Give baby a sweet spot to relax, play, & explore from birth to the toddler years with the Baby Einstein Ocean Explorers Kick to It Opus Musical Infant to Toddler Rocker. 2 modes: Baby Activated Mode rewards baby’s kicks with lights, music, & sounds. Parent Activated Mode plays up to 30 minutes of lights & music. As baby grows, transform to a stationary seat with gentle vibrations & toddler rocker!

Keeps baby close & engaged Baby or parent-led play Two ways to engage and keep baby at ease: In Baby-Activated Mode, baby’s movements are rewarded with dancing lights and 25+ melodies and sounds to entertain and delight infants. In Parent-Activated Mode, the press of a button lets parents give baby 30+ minutes of melodies and dancing lights. More modes for baby’s comfort Choose between 3 modes to engage and entertain baby: infant rocker, stationary seat, or toddler rocker. Also features a vibration function to help baby relax while seated. Portable discovery Two takealong toys let baby continue the discovery on-the-go! Featuring crab bead chaser & starfish rattle, these ocean-themed toys encourage baby to bat, kick, shake, and explore the senses and fine motor skills. Light-up toy bar is removable.

A comfy spot for baby’s growth & discovery from age 0 to 30 months Made to meet baby’s changing needs Whether baby needs extra comfort courtesy of the seat’s vibration unit, or a rocking multisensory session to reward those new motor skills, the seat features multiple ways to delight your little one. Adapts as baby grows As baby grows, the chair transforms to meet baby’s changing play and comfort needs. Newborn and younger infants will love the engaging lights and music, comforting vibrations, and will delight as their kicks and movements trigger the lights and music! Remove the electronic toy bar to transform into a cozy, stationary seat for babies who can sit independently. Transform the seat again into a toddler rocker to give older children a place to rock and relax. Cleans in a snap. Seat pad is removeable for easy cleaning. Simply remove the seat pad from the frame and clean with a damp cloth and mild soap. Air dry. Toys, frame, and the toy bar all wipe clean with a damp cloth and mild soap.
An Ocean of Learning Discover more STEAM-based, educational toys and gear with the Baby Einstein Ocean Explorers collection.
